thread.title: MAFS's Anthony complains he hasn't had intimacy with Nadia
thread.title_full: MAFS's Anthony complains he hasn't had intimacy with Nadia | Daily Mail Online

author: Lauren Ingram For Daily Mail Australia
title: MAFS's Anthony complains he hasn't had intimacy with Nadia
text:
He's been dubbed the 'villain' of Married At First Sight Australia, and Anthony appeared to further that reputation during Tuesday night's episode of the show.
The racing broadcaster fought with wife Nadia a number of times during their home stay in Brisbane, questioning her career ambitions and time management.
But it was during a dinner on her apartment rooftop with her friends that Anthony got very agitated.
Not so happy couple: Anthony and Nadia had tension between them on Tuesday night's episode of Married At First Sight
Sunshine state: The pair have been staying at Nadia's home in Brisbane for a week
The 33-year-old complained to the camera that the couple were not as close physically as he would have liked.
'We've had problems with intimacy,' he told producers.
This issue seemed to come to a head at the dinner, when Nadia's friends started discussing past relationships she had been in.
'It's not that I don't have option, I have options,' she said, referring to why she was on the show. 'But do I want to settle down with a 25-year-old? Not really.'
'Do I want to wake up in two years with them leaving because they're not ready to commit? Guys will tell you anything they want to get what they want.'
Upset: But Anthony has complained that there have been problems with 'intimacy' between the couple
'That's your error': During a dinner party, the 33-year-old told Nadia problems with her ex boyfriends were her fault
Anthony first blamed Nadia for her relationship problems, then got annoyed about the subject altogether.
'You went for the wrong blokes, that's your error,' he said. '[But] we don't need to talk about that because you're married to me, I don't need to know your history.'
He then once again mentioned the 'intimacy' problems he said the couple were having.
'I don't need to hear that stuff': He told his wife that he didn't want to know about her 'history'
'You've been frigid': During a preview for Sunday night's episode, Anthony called Nadia frigid
'I don't really need to hear that stuff,' he told the camera. 'In terms of romance and intimacy with Nadia, she's not comfortable with certain things. But from the sounds of it, she's had guys in the past and she had no issues with them.'
Tensions appear to boil over during Sunday night's episode, with a preview showing Anthony confronting Nadia over the issue.
'For lack of a better word, you've been frigid,' he tells his wife during the commitment ceremony.
What her reaction will be, only time will tell.
Married At First Sight returns 7:00pm Sunday on Channel Nine.
